frontmatter.title: How Great Leaders Inspire Action
frontmatter.short:
You might be leading a team, crafting the bullet points on your resume, making a recommendation on Facebook. 
What do you say to persuade others to take action?
What do you say?
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
